title: WaveSpeed AI - Transform Images into Stunning Videos

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our innovative technology allows for seamless video creation from your images.

items.title: Rapid Video Creation
items.description: Transform images into impressive videos in seconds with our cutting-edge AI.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No complicated setups. Just upload your images and let the AI generate the video.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: Your images never leave your device. We prioritize your privacy with in-browser processing.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to create breathtaking videos from your images

items.title: Upload Images
items.description: Drag and drop your images or browse for files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Animation
items.description: Our intelligent AI analyzes and adds motion to your images, turning them into immersive videos.

items.title: Download Video
items.description: Preview your video and easily download it in high resolution to share with others.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join thousands who have transformed their images into videos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: Using WaveSpeed to turn my travel photos into videos was a game-changer! It's so simple and the quality is fantastic.

items.name: Daniel Lee
items.comment: As a professional storyteller, I love how quickly I can create compelling video content from still images.

items.name: Olivia Brown
items.comment: The ability to create videos without technical skills is incredible. I finished projects in record time!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about WaveSpeed AI for image-to-video conversion

items.title: What types of images can be used for video creation?
items.description: WaveSpeed can convert a variety of images, including landscapes, portraits, and product photos, into videos with animated elements and effects.

items.title: Is the service free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free conversion credits daily, allowing extensive use. Additional credits can be earned through challenges or by subscribing for more features.

items.title: Can I use the videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Paid users can use their generated videos for commercial projects. Free-tier users may only use videos for personal use.

items.title: How does privacy work during the conversion?
items.description: All processing happens directly in your browser, ensuring that your images are never uploaded or stored anywhere outside your device.

footer.heading: Ready to Bring Your Images to Life?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and see your visuals transform. No sign-up needed.
